entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New-Wes-Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:50 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 6:30 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: NE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 15 cm except 5 cm north of Cape Freels. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast overnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
